replies.author: Salt_lovely
replies.txt_content: 计分板用的是哪个插件可以连带配置发一下吗？也许是计分板的插件坏了

replies.author: 々无名〃
replies.txt_content: papi插件坏了，去spigot下个对应的版本

replies.author: 々无名〃
replies.txt_content: 换插件的时候记得把配置文件夹全都删了

replies.author: xinge54088
replies.txt_content: 使用/papi reload 不行的话去这里https://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/placeholderapi-placeholders/下载变量拓展

replies.author: gxdn
replies.txt_content:
如果重新下载了PAPI还不行,试试这个方法,把PAPI生成的文件夹删了,然后
把以下指令运行一遍,如果你是1.11.2的或1.14端,我可以把PAPI的配置文件夹发给你,替换掉就好了,这情况我也出现过
papi ecloud download player
papi ecloud download vault
papi ecloud download server
papi ecloud download javascript
papi ecloud download Multiverse
papi reload

replies.author: Allure倾城
replies.txt_content: 用的什么版本的papi插件啊？
